revision.text: ==Xhosa== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|xh|bnt-pro|*-dèka|t=let, let go, cease, allow}}. The expected reflex would be '''-leka'''. However, some Nguni dialects have /j/ as a regular reflex of *d, so this may be explained as a borrowing from another dialect. ===Verb=== {{xh-verb|yeka}} # to [[stop]] ====Inflection==== {{rfinfl|xh|verb}} ---- ==Zulu== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|zu|bnt-pro|*-dèka|t=let, let go, cease, allow}}. The expected reflex would be '''-leka'''. However, some Nguni dialects have /j/ as a regular reflex of *d, so this may be explained as a borrowing from another dialect. ===Pronunciation=== {{zu-IPA|yeka}} ===Verb=== {{zu-verb|yeka}} # to [[stop]] # to [[let go]] # to [[leave]] [[alone]] ====Inflection==== {{zu-infl-verb|L}} ===References=== {{R:zu:ZED|-yeka|6.3}}
